content: fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy pattern by acanthus crochet fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 1 fabulous freddie the pharaoh s mummy cthulhu crochet pattern by acanthus crochet amigurumi pattern introduction freddie is a stylish fun-loving frog who likes to dress up this is freddie as a mummy but not any old mummy oh no he is a pharaoh mummy with a crown and all the crown is based on one of the most important egyptian crowns the pschent or the double crown the white part represented upper egypt and the red part lower egypt on depictions in reliefs and sculpture the crown also had a golden snake in the front this mummy has had an active afterlife he has lost an eye and his bandages are coming undone but he has not lost his love of life and chasing museum security guards size freddie without a crown is 3 15 inch/8 cm high skill level the pattern requires familiarity with the basic amigurumi stiches and is thus suitable to advanced beginners or intermediate crocheters yarn for this pattern a fine cotton yarn was used specifically schachenmayr catania standard yarn weight 2 fine 1 75 oz/137 yds 50g/125m it is a very popular yarn for the making of especially amigurumi and has even been certified as suitable to produce toys din en 71-3 2019 yarn color a gray catania color 00435 smoke gray need around 77 yds / 70 m yarn color b white catania color 00106 white need around 27 yds/ 25 m yarn color c cloth catania color 00257 bast need around 16 yds/ 15 m yarn color d red catania color 00258 strawberry need around 16 yds/ 15 m yarn color e yellow catania color 00249 gold need less than 2 yds/ 2 m fabulous freddie the pharaoh mummy © 2024 acanthus crochet 2 hook size us 2 2 5 mm other materials one safety eye 0 5 inch / 12 mm or larger sewing needle scissors fiber fill and stitch markers for the snake you will need a small length of thin wire 0 3 mm gauge stitches the pattern uses us terminology most stitches are single_crochet with single_crochet increase and decreases as needed the bottom row of the crown requires half double double and treble crochets where more complicated techniques are needed step by step instructions illustrated with photographs are provided in the pattern video tutorials in my youtube channel i provide several short how to tutorials on a range of amigurumi basics i also have tutorials specific to the fabulous freddie range of patterns i have tried to include a hyperlink to the relevant tutorial in the appropriate place within the instructions just click on the icon but if for some reason the links do not work in your pdf you can find these two playlists on my channel https //www youtube com/@acanthuscrochet/playlists stitch abbreviations chain chain sl slip_stitch
